ECE, 1998, Delhi College of Engineering (now DTU), Delhi B.E., ECE, 1991, Delhi Institute of Technology (now NSIT), Delhi M.A. Higher Education Leadership and Policy Studies, 2010, University of Maryland-College Park, USA Research Areas of Interest In Engineering: Applications of Wavelet Transforms, Deep Learning, Compressed Sensing, Sparse Reconstruction, fMRI/MRI/EEG/DTI Signal and Image Processing, Genomics Signal Processing, Signal Processing for Communication Engineering, Energy Harvesting In Education: Higher Education Policy, Success, and Retention; Student Learning outcomes assessment Contact Information email: anubha@iiitd.ac.in Anubha Gupta, PhD. Professor Department of Electronics and Communications Engineering Indraprastha Institute of Info. Tech. (IIIT) Delhi New Delhi, India.
